text:
Our appender which is extended from the DailyRollingFileAppender has stopped to
append after creating a new file : it overwrites the current log. For the first
log file everything is OK. Whereas the second log file -the new one- do not
append anymore. No new file is created afterwards.

Note : Our 24 hours a day application software is running under weblogic
platform 8.1 (with JDK 1.4.1).
Note 2 : Our appender manages only a dynamic change of the file name.
creator: stephane.bosc2@atosorigin.com
stephane.bosc2@atosorigin.com
text:
The DailyRollingAppenderFile.setFile(String) doesn't keep the value of the
append parameter but update with false....
